items.sentence: Tom was angry with Mary because she was in his parking space.
There must be lots of places in Boston you haven\'t seen yet.
Tom admitted that he didn\'t really know how to speak French.
We\'re going to have a birthday party for Tom Monday evening.
The calendar on the refrigerator had Tom\'s birthday circled.
We have to hurry if we want to arrive at the station on time.
What puzzles me most is why Tom even bothered to go see Mary.
When I was in Boston, I used to eat out at least once a week.
When Tom was younger, he worked in Australia for three years.
I\'m sorry to disturb you, but there\'s a phone call for you.
If it\'s a good day tomorrow, let\'s go to the river to swim.
I can smell Mary\'s perfume. She must have been here earlier.
The police said that Tom may have fallen asleep at the wheel.
There were no passengers on the bus at the time of the crash.
Can you think of anyone who would want to rent my extra room?
I don\'t suppose that there\'s much chance of that happening.
I don\'t want you to think I\'m not happy with your decision.
If I were you, I\'d want to know what Tom is doing right now.
Even though we know smoking is unhealthy, people still smoke.
I thought Tom would eventually realize Mary didn\'t like him.
